attributes.action: Replace fuel tax with C02 emissions tax at a fixed rate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the idea of paying so and so much of your fuel tax to the tax man is aggravating and many people do not like this so i am petitioning for a C02 emissions tax system that allows the goverment to spend the money raised into specifically countering the problem of trying to reduce emissions this can be done by creating a new depart,ment that takes these fund and specifically looks into alternative energy for cars and hopefully coming up with that alternative idea that will scrap tax on out journeys altogether thankyou
